support.title: Support centre
support.gatewaySchemaDescription: Find out what we have in our schema and support we offer here.
support.teamManagementDescription: Help with the team management and how to perform certain actions and what permissions you are assigned.
support.toolsDescription: What are Tools and Papers on the Gateway? How are they created and how can you use them? Get help with Tools and papers.
support.searchDescription: Learn how to search entities on the Gateway.
support.metadataOnboardingDescription: Find technical documentation for  integrating with the Gateway.
support.darDescription: Learn about Data Access Request forms and process.
support.cohortDiscoveryDescription: Find materials to get your started on Cohort Discovery.

explainer.unsupportedVideo: Your browser does not support the video element
explainer.title: Explainer

releases.description1: The Gateway requires a significant volume of design and development work to deliver our vision and ambition. To achieve this our teams are continually working on the Gateway and deliver major software releases approximately every 4 weeks.
releases.description2: On this page we explain what new developments we are currently working on and list the major releases made since the Gateway was released in its current format in June 2020. Clicking on an entry provides further detail about the functionality that the particular release delivered.

cohortDiscoveryRequest.title: Cohort Discovery Registration
cohortDiscoveryRequest.text: Your Safe People status will be assessed based on your Gateway registered <userprofile>user profile</userprofile>. Please ensure this is complete and up to date before you submit this request and includes your institutional email address, Orcid id and role description.
cohortDiscoveryRequest.userDeclarationAdditional: All users of the Cohort Discovery are required to accept the declaration below.
cohortDiscoveryRequest.statementIntro: I confirm that my use of the tool will be for the sole purpose of understanding the size of populations relevant to a particular research question and that any resulting study or clinical trial will be for public benefit as defined by the National Data Guardian.
cohortDiscoveryRequest.statement1: I acknowledge that:<list><item>Any subsequent access to the data for research purposes (including publications) willbe subject to the relevant data access processes of the data custodian(s).</item><item>Some data custodians do not allow results from queries on their data to be visible to commercial organisations and the tool will not show results from queries run by commercial users in these cases.</item></list>
cohortDiscoveryRequest.statement2: I will not:<list><item>Share, publish or communicate the results or findings from the tool in any way, with the exception of sharing results with collaborators working on a research study or clinical trial and in support of an application for research funding for an eligible research study or clinical trial.</item><item>Use the results for marketing or policy development.</item></list>
cohortDiscoveryRequest.statementOutro: I understand that my access to the tool may be terminated if I do not comply with the above.
cohortDiscoveryRequest.checkboxLabel: I have read and agree to the user declaration

profile.title: Your profile
profile.text: Use this form to register an account and update your account on the Gateway

cohortDiscoveryAdmin.title: Cohort Discovery Admin
cohortDiscoveryAdmin.text: Find and manage status of all Cohort Discovery users, Click individual account users name to access decision page to review and edit status
cohortDiscoveryAdmin.dateActionedTooltip: This is the date for the latest status update for this user
cohortDiscoveryAdmin.expiryWarning: This user access is close to expiration date

create.title: Manage or create a publication entry
create.intro: Publications should be peer reviewed documents (including pre-prints or articles published in a journal)
create.addResourcesInfo: Show relationships for publications, data uses, other publications and analysis scripts, tools and software. Resources must already be on the Gateway.

list.title: Publications
list.text: View, add, edit and archive your publications.

unarchive.label: Unarchive publication so it is live on the Gateway
unarchive.title: Unarchive a publication
unarchive.content: Select whether you would like to move this publication to Active (this will make your publication available within search results) or Draft (where you can edit the publication before making it available within search results).

library.title: Library
library.text: The space where you can sort all your datasets and entity types

generalEnquiries.title: General Enquiry
generalEnquiries.text: Send a general enquiry to one or multiple data custodians. You will receive an email copy of the enquiry sent. The data custodian(s) will reply via email to your preferred email address, with a copy shared with the Gateway (should the data custodian(s) wish to do so).
generalEnquiries.buttonTooltip: Select at least one dataset to enable

feasibilityEnquiries.title: Feasibility Enquiry
feasibilityEnquiries.text: Send a feasibility enquiry to one or multiple data custodians. You must select all entities of interest from your library before starting a feasibility enquiry. You will receive an email copy of the enquiry sent. The data custodian(s) will reply via email to your preferred email address, with a copy shared with the Gateway (should the data custodian(s) wish to do so).
feasibilityEnquiries.buttonTooltip: Select at least one dataset to enable

dataUses.description: View, add, edit, archive and check the status of your data uses.

TeamDataUses.text: View, add, edit, archive and check the status of your data uses.
TeamDataUses.title: Data Use

unarchive.title: Unarchive this data use
unarchive.content: Select whether you would like to move this data use to Active (this will make your data use available within search results) or Draft (where you can edit the data use before making it available within search results).

archive.label: Archive data use so it is no longer live on the Gateway

CreateDataset.legendIntro: You will see a legend to help you as you on-board your dataset metadata
CreateDataset.submissionInvalidText: There are some missing fields that are required in order to upload this metadata. Please refer to the progress bar on the left for which fields are incomplete
CreateDataset.checkboxIntro: Select all dataset themes relevant to your metadata, this determines the metadata form questions:
CreateDataset.uploadSuccess: Your data has been successfully uploaded

checkboxes.healthAndDiseaseTooltip: Includes any data related to mental health, cardiovascular, cancer, rare diseases, metabolic and endocrine, neurological, reproductive, maternity and neonatology, respiratory, immunity, musculoskeletal, vision, renal and urogenital, oral and gastrointestinal, cognitive function or hearing.
checkboxes.treatmentsInterventionsTooltip: Includes any data related to treatment or interventions related to vaccines or which are preventative or therapeutic in nature.
checkboxes.measurementsTestsTooltip: Includes any data related to laboratory or other diagnostics.
checkboxes.imagingTypesTooltip: Includes any data related to CT, MRI, PET, x-ray, ultrasound or pathology imaging.
checkboxes.omicsTooltip: Includes any data related to proteomics, transcriptomics, epigenomics, metabolomics, multiomics, metagenomics or genomics.
checkboxes.socioeconomicTooltip: Includes any data related to education, crime and justice, ethnicity, housing, labour, ageing, economics, marital status, social support, deprivation, religion, occupation, finances or family circumstances.
checkboxes.lifestyleTooltip: Includes any data related to smoking, physical activity, dietary habits or alcohol.
checkboxes.registryTooltip: Includes any data related to disease registries for research, national disease registries, audits, or birth and deaths records.
checkboxes.environmentAndEnergyTooltip: Includes any data related to the monitoring or study of environmental or energy factors or events.
checkboxes.informationAndCommunicationTooltip: Includes any data related to the study or application of information and communication.
checkboxes.politicsTooltip: Includes any data related to political views, activities, voting, etc.

CreateDataset.errorLoading: An error occured while loading the Dataset

structuralMetadata.intro: Upload a file with the description of all table and data elements that are included in the dataset. This will be rendered in tabular format for a researcher to review the dataset table(s).
structuralMetadata.completionGuidance1: Name of the table in the dataset. Use a fully qualified name if appropriate.
structuralMetadata.completionGuidance2: Description of the table in the dataset.
structuralMetadata.completionGuidance3: Name of the column in the table dataset.
structuralMetadata.completionGuidance4: Description of the column in the table dataset.
structuralMetadata.completionGuidance5: Type of data contained in the column.
structuralMetadata.completionGuidance6: Please indicate (using True / False) whether the information must be treated as sensitive and may need additional constraints / removal / anonymisation / masking through the data access request process. <bold>Definition:</bold> An ODRL conformant policy expressing the rights associated with the resource.
structuralMetadata.uploadSuccess: Warning! Uploaded files are automatically saved to the dataset metadata. Uploading a new file will delete the previously uploaded structural metadata.
structuralMetadata.uploadMessage: Please wait while we scan and process your file. When processing has finished, your data will display below and you will be able to submit the Metadata to the Gateway. Scanning and processing typically takes 30-45 seconds, please do not leave this page

CreateDataset.confirmSave: Do you want to save changes as draft before exiting?
CreateDataset.backToManagementPage: Back to dataset metadata management page

create.title: Manage or create a Collection
create.intro: Collections are groupings of useful resources based on set criteria, and are a useful way for a Researcher to explore resources that are linked to each other. Types of Collections could include resources related to a research domain, research hub or research project.
create.addImagesInfo: Upload an image W700 x H350 (1:0.5). If your image is of a lower resolution a default Gateway Collection image will be displayed on the Collection until a higher resolution image is uploaded.
create.aspectRatioError: File needs to be of approximately of aspect ratio 2:1 (width:height)
create.addResourcesInfo: Link resources in the Gateway to your Collection

TeamCollections.title: Collections
TeamCollections.text: View, add, edit, archive and check the status of your collections.

unarchive.title: Unarchive the Collection so it is live on the Gateway
unarchive.content: Select whether you would like to move this to Active (this will make your collection available within search results) or Draft (where you can edit the metadata before making it available within search results).
unarchive.label: Unarchive the Collection so it is live on the Gateway

archive.label: Archive the Collection so it is no longer live on the Gateway

create.title: Manage or create analysis script, tool or software
create.intro: Analysis script, tool or software can be anything you or someone else created or used during a research project
create.addResourcesInfo: Link publications, data uses and other analysis scripts, tools or software. Resources must be added to the Gateway first
create.relationshipInfo: Dataset(s) related to this analysis script, tool or software

edit.label: Edit analysis script, tool or software metadata

create.title: Integration
create.text: Input and edit the authentication information for the Gateway system to use for the integration.
create.helper: Entities created via an FMA integration can only be managed (updated or deleted/archived) via the FMA integration. Entities created via another method (manual, API integration) cannot be managed via the FMA integration.

apiManagement.howTo: How to setup and manage integrations
apiManagement.cannotCreate: Please note that HDR UK cannot create Private Apps on behalf of users.

create.title: Private apps
create.text: Use this form to create your Private App on the Gateway

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.intro: Use this form to assign the appropriate permissions for secure integration. Your App will only be allowed to use APIs for the permissions you have defined. App permissions are the responsibility of your ‘team’.
permissions.helper: Entities created via a Private App can only be managed (updated or deleted/archived) via the Private App. Entities created via another method (manual, HDR UK Datasets Integration) cannot be managed via the Private App.

create.defaultGuidance: Please click on a question to display guidance

selectedQuestions.title: Selected Questions
selectedQuestions.description: Currently selected questions for your DAR template.

questionBank.title: Question Bank
questionBank.description: Other available questions you can add from the question bank.

home.flashyText: Explore the different functionalities of the Gateway
home.touchDevice: Explore the different functionalities of the Gateway
home.welcomeText: Search, discover and request access to hundreds of datasets, tools and resources for your research. Join the thousands of researchers and scientists worldwide who are already using the Gateway for research and scientific discovery.

datasets.label: Datasets & BioSamples
datasets.title: Datasets & BioSamples
datasets.text: Explore datasets and biosamples from across the UK and beyond and then navigate their associated resources e.g. metadata, linked datasets, data provenance, publications, analysis scripts & software and demographics.

dur.label: Data Uses / Research Projects
dur.title: Data Uses / Research Projects
dur.text: Find data uses/research projects: Search and filter data uses/research projects related to specific datasets and other features

feasibility.label: Cohort Discovery
feasibility.title: Cohort Discovery Tool
feasibility.text: Compare the numbers of relevant records across different datasets: query federated datasets to find out how many records match a specified criteria e.g. the number of females with asthma.

dataProviders.label: Data Custodians
dataProviders.title: Data Custodians
dataProviders.text: Search data custodians, discover their associated resources (e.g. datasets, publications, analysis scripts & software), and find out how to contact them.

collections.label: Collections
collections.title: Collections
collections.text: Discover research resources: datasets, analysis scripts, software, data uses, and publications grouped together by domain, disease, theme or organisation

phenotypes.label: Phenotypes
phenotypes.title: Phenotype Library
phenotypes.text: Find reusable phenotype algorithms: Search and deposit human and machine readable phenotype algorithms

diseaseAtlas.label: Disease Atlas
diseaseAtlas.title: Disease Atlas
diseaseAtlas.text: The Disease Atlas is under development and is testing systematic approaches to understanding diseases across the NHS

dataCustodianNetworks.label: Data Custodian Networks
dataCustodianNetworks.title: Data Custodian Networks
dataCustodianNetworks.text: Discover networks of data custodians to learn about the resources available across a network e.g. the NHS England SDE Network or the Research Data Scotland Network.

publications.label: Publications
publications.title: Publications
publications.text: Understand what questions can be answered by specific dataset: Search and deposit publications which used a dataset or publications which describe a dataset

tools.label: Analysis Scripts & Software
tools.title: Analysis Scripts & Software
tools.text: Discover reusable community shared scripts and software: Search for data analysis / cleaning / transformation / standardisation scripts related to specific datasets or general software/tools

courses.label: Courses
courses.title: Courses
courses.text: Discover training materials and resources to enhance your data science skills for Health data research. Learn at your pace and achieve CPD certificates to showcase your personal development

item1.title: Support Centre
item1.text: Explore Gateway features and learn how to use them. You can also submit queries and feedback to help us improve the Gateway.

item2.title: Community
item2.text: Designed with and for the community, the Gateway is built for collaboration. Discover how you can get involved.

saved_searches.title: Saved searches
saved_searches.text: Use this page to display saved search results and manage your saved searches.

deleteModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

delete.message: Your saved search was deleted successfully

status.500: There was an error when trying to delete your saved search

search.searchExplainerDatasets: Search by keywords, phenotypes, SNOMED code, LOINC term, Read code, ICD10 code, MESH term
search.searchExplainerDataUse: Search by lead organisation, data custodian
search.searchExplainerPublications: Search by publication title, publication DOI, dataset DOI, software title, data custodian name
search.resultLimit: There are more than 100 results. We recommend refining your search.
search.publicationWelcomeHeader: Welcome to publications search on the Gateway.
search.publicationWelcomeText1: The Gateway publication search enables queries on: <list><item>manually curated publications saved within the Gateway; and</item><item>automatically curated online publications using advanced filters.</item></list>
search.publicationWelcomeText2: Manually uploaded Gateway publications have been curated to enable automated filtering of publications about a specific dataset; publications using a specific dataset; and publications linked to datasets from a specific data custodian.
search.publicationWelcomeText3: For automated querying of online publications utilising <link>Europe PMC</link>, the Gateway performs additional filtering on the 'METHODS' field to improve the relevance of results returned.
search.publicationWelcomeText4: <bold>To start your search, select your search source (either "Search Europe PMC" or "Search Gateway"), enter the Keyword(s) of interest or the name of a dataset in the search box at the top, and hit enter/return on your keyboard.</bold>

dataset.populationSizeTooltip: Reported dataset population size in terms of number of people
dataset.dataTypeTooltip: The focus areas to which the dataset content relates
dataset.publisherNameTooltip: Individual or organisation providing metadata on the Gateway
dataset.dataUseTitlesTooltip: Public record of data an organisation has shared with other individuals or organisations for the purpose of research
dataset.geographicLocationTooltip: The geographical area covered by the dataset
dataset.dateRangeTooltip: The time period the dataset covers. The end date may be empty depending on publishing frequency and data collection plan
dataset.accessServiceTooltip: Method for accessing the dataset, if access request is approved
dataset.containsTissueTooltip: Restrict your search result to datasets with biospecimen samples
dataset.sampleAvailabilityTooltip: Physical samples associated with the dataset

dataUseRegister.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
dataUseRegister.sectorTooltip: The type of organisation that has signed a contract to access the data

paper.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
paper.publicationDateTooltip: The range of years during which results were published
paper.publicationTypeTooltip: The type of publication: research articles, review articles, preprints or books and documents
paper.sourceTooltip: Select either to run your search against tailored fields in Europe PMC or search the Gateway publications

collection.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
collection.publisherNameTooltip: Individual or organisation providing metadata on the Gateway

dataProvider.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed

dataProvider.geographicLocationTooltip: The geographical area covered by the dataset

tool.licenseTooltip: Analysis script and software usage restriction, using EU controlled vocabulary
tool.programmingLanguagesTooltip: Programming language used in developing an analysis script or software
tool.typeCategoryTooltip: Categorisation based on where in the research journey an analysis script or software is used
tool.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed

You will receive an email copy of the enquiry sent. The data custodian(s) will reply via email to your preferred email address, with a copy shared with the Gateway.

ResultCard.datasetsTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
ResultCard.dataCustodianTooltip: The individual or organisation responsible for the safe custody, transport, storage of, and access to data

populationSize.label: Population Size
populationSize.tooltip: Population size associated with the population type in the dataset

dateRangePublisher.label: Date Range
dateRangePublisher.tooltip: Start and end of the time period that the dataset provides coverage for

dataStandard.label: Data Standard
dataStandard.tooltip: Data models standards that the dataset has been stored in or transformed to

dataProvider.label: Data Custodian
dataProvider.tooltip: Individual or organisation to be contacted for a dataset on the Gateway

accessService.label: Access Service
accessService.tooltip: Method for accessing the dataset, if access request is approved

cohortDiscovery.label: Cohort Discovery
cohortDiscovery.tooltip: Indicates if frequency count accessible in HDR UK cohort discovery tool

containsTissue.label: BioSample availability
containsTissue.tooltip: Availability of associated physical samples. Note: This information may not be provided by the Data custodian

hasTechnicalMetadata.label: Structural Metadata
hasTechnicalMetadata.tooltip: Descriptions and details about the tables and columns within a dataset

useAddLibraryModal.title: Add dataset to your library
useAddLibraryModal.buttonContinueText: Add to library and continue searching
useAddLibraryModal.content:
Adding datasets to your Library will allow you to perform the following actions: 
   * Select one or multiple datasets to raise an enquiry for one or multiple data custodians.
   * Select one or multiple datasets to raise a Data Access Request (DAR) application for one or multiple data custodians (if the data custodians have DAR enabled).
 
Access your profile page in the navigation menu to see all of your saved datasets.

dataUse.projectIdTextTooltip: A unique identifier for the project assigned by the data custodian
dataUse.organisationNameTooltip: The name of the legal entity that signs the contract to access the data
dataUse.organisationIdTooltip: A unique identifier for an organisation
dataUse.organisationSectorTooltip: The type of organisation that has signed a contract to access the data
dataUse.nonGatewayApplicantsTooltip: The lead applicant or applicants named on the project
dataUse.fundersAndSponsorsTooltip: The name of any funders or sponsors involved in the project
dataUse.accreditedResearcherStatusTooltip: Specifies whether the lead appplicant(s) are accredited under the Digital Economy Act 2017 (DEA) as defined by the ONS Research Code of Practice and Accreditation criteria
dataUse.sublicenceArrangementsTooltip: Whether there are any permissions for the applicant to share the data beyond the named parties
dataUse.projectTitleTooltip: The title of the project/research study/request
dataUse.laySummaryTooltip: A concise and clear description of the project in language that is understandable to the general public
dataUse.publicBenefitStatementTooltip: A description of the anticipated outcomes, or impact of project on the general public
dataUse.requestCategoryTypeTooltip: The category of study the project falls into
dataUse.technicalSummaryTooltip: A summary of the proposed research, in a manner that is suitable for a specialist reader
dataUse.otherApprovalCommitteesTooltip: Other decision-making bodies who have also authorised the project
dataUse.projectStartDateTooltip: The date the project is scheduled to start or actual start date
dataUse.projectEndDateTooltip: The date the project is scheduled to finish or actual end date
dataUse.latestApprovalDateTooltip: The last date the data access request for this project was approved by a data custodian
dataUse.datasetsTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
dataUse.dataSensitivityLevelTooltip: The level of identifiability of the data being accessed, as defined by Understanding Patient Data
dataUse.legalBasisForDataArticle6: Legal basis for provision of data under Article 6
dataUse.legalBasisForDataArticle6Tooltip: The lawful basis for processing are set out in Article 6 of the GDPR
dataUse.legalBasisForDataArticle9: Lawful conditions for provision of data under Article 9
dataUse.legalBasisForDataArticle9Tooltip: The lawful basis for processing are set out in Article 9 of the GDPR
dataUse.dutyOfConfidentialityTooltip: Whether confidential information is being disclosed, and if so, the legal basis for use of identifiable data
dataUse.nationalDataOptoutTooltip: Specifies whether opt-out of individual confidential patient information (for secondary use) has been applied to the data prior to release
dataUse.requestFrequencyTooltip: Whether this a 'one-off' data request, or recurring provision over a specific time period
dataUse.datasetLinkageDescription: For linked datasets, specify how the linkage will take place
dataUse.datasetLinkageDescriptionTooltip: If the applicant(s) intends for the datasets to be linked with any additional datasets, information on the organisations undertaking linkages and how the linkage will take place (including risks/mitigations)
dataUse.confidentialDataDescription: Description of the confidential data being used
dataUse.confidentialDataDescriptionTooltip: A description of the specific patient identifiable fields that have been included in the dataset(s) being accessed
dataUse.accessDateTooltip: The date the data access was granted and active research started
dataUse.accessTypeTooltip: Whether the data is accessed within a Trusted Research Environment (TRE) or via the traditional data release model
dataUse.privacyEnhancements: How has data been processed to enhance privacy?
dataUse.privacyEnhancementsTooltip: Description of the tools or software used to reduce level of identifiable data being shared
dataUse.nonGatewayOutputsTooltip: A URL link to any academic or non-academic research outputs, including code or software
dataUse.gatewayOutputsToolsTooltip: A URL link to any academic or non-academic research outputs, including code or software
dataUse.gatewayOutputsPapersTooltip: A URL link to any academic or non-academic research outputs, including code or software

ActionBar.label: Back to Data Uses search results

tool.lastUpdatedTooltip: When the metadata for this entity was last updated
tool.licenseTooltip: The type of software licence for this entity, if applicable

ContactSupport.title: Still can’t find what you’re looking for?
ContactSupport.content: The quickest way to get your issue solved is through the links above, but if you aren’t able to find a solution then contact us here:

ProtectedRoute.title: Protected route
ProtectedRoute.text: You must be logged in to view this content

UploadFile.uploadHelper: Must be a {fileType} file, cannot exceed 10 mb per file.
UploadFile.error: An error has occured. Please check your file and try again

CohortRequestSent.title: Request Sent!
CohortRequestSent.text: We have sent confirmation to your registered e-mail address. We will then notify you with the decision via your registered e-mail address within 5 business days.

DarEnquiryDialog.messageEnabled: In the meantime, you can still contact the Data Custodian via the general enquiry or feasibility enquiry form to discuss your requirements and guide you through their Data Access Request process.
DarEnquiryDialog.titleNotEnabled: Data access requests not enabled for this Data Custodian
DarEnquiryDialog.messageNotEnabled: The Data Custodian for this dataset has not yet enabled data access requests via the Gateway. Please select the Access Information button below to proceed to the dataset metadata page.
DarEnquiryDialog.messageNotEnabledOtherInstructions: Alternatively contact the Data Custodian using the <generalEnquiryLink></generalEnquiryLink> or <feasabilityEnquiryLink></feasabilityEnquiryLink> forms and they will contact you to discuss your requirements and guide you through their data access request process.
DarEnquiryDialog.feasibilityEnquiryButton: Make feasibility enquiry for this dataset
DarEnquiryDialog.generalEnquiryButton: Make general enquiry for this dataset

SaveSearch.name: Name your search query
SaveSearch.nameRequired: A search query title is required
SaveSearch.nameLabel: Enter a title to remember this search query

ProvidersDialog.title: Sign in or create an account
ProvidersDialog.intro1: Anyone can search and view datasets, collections and other resources with or without an account. Creating an account allows you to:

RelatedResources.title: Add related resources
RelatedResources.intro: Search for data uses, publications and other analysis scripts, tools and software to add to your entry. Resources must already be on the Gateway.

FeasibilityEnquiryDialog.enquire: Make feasibility enquiry for this dataset only
FeasibilityEnquiryDialog.addToLibrary: Add to library and continue searching
FeasibilityEnquiryDialog.helpText:
To make a feasibility enquiry for multiple datasets:
 
1. Add datasets to your library
2. Generate a feasibility enquiry from your library page

DatasetRelationshipDialog.isPartOfTooltip: A Dataset could be part of a larger group of Datasets. This relationship indicates that the Dataset is a component or subset of a broader collection of related Datasets.
DatasetRelationshipDialog.isDerivedFromTooltip: The data in this Dataset is derived or calculated from data in another Dataset. Some examples of types of derivations are if the Dataset is extracted or a subset of another Dataset. This relationship indicates that one Dataset is encompassed within another.
DatasetRelationshipDialog.linkedDatasetsTooltip: If this Dataset can be linked to another Dataset through a common identifier or variable.
DatasetRelationshipDialog.isMemberOfTooltip: If another Dataset is similar to this Dataset in some manner, but cannot necessarily be directly linked to the Dataset.
